name: Hi Lo Paradise Cove Edition
description:
Welcome to the world of card gambling! Ensure hours of fun with this new card game.

Just select a card from the bunch and guess what the next card would hold for you:

A Higher rank or a lower one from the previously selected card.
Also you can guess if the card you chose is a RED or a Black one to get additional coin winnings.
Keep on adding earnings to your treasure by constantly winning or just choose to cash out.
But remember! If you lose, you lose everything.
Stop wondering! Download now to test your fortune!
